info.name: Talentum API
info.description: Complete API collection for Talentum System including companies, departments, employees, projects, and performance reviews.

item.name: Companies

request.description: Retrieve a list of all companies. All authenticated users can access this endpoint.
Retrieve details of a specific company including auto-calculated counts.

item.description: Company management endpoints. Companies are read-only for non-admin users.

item.name: Departments

request.description: Retrieve a list of departments. All authenticated users can access this endpoint.
Create a new department. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Retrieve details of a specific department.
Update department information. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Delete a department. Requires Admin or Manager role.

item.description: Department management endpoints. Admin and Manager users can create, update, and delete departments.

item.name: Employees

query.description: Order by: name, company__name, department__name, hired_on, created_at

request.description: Retrieve a list of employees. All authenticated users can access this endpoint.

body.raw:
{
  "company": {{company_id}},
  "department": {{department_id}},
  "user": {{user_id}},
  "name": "John Doe",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "mobile_number": "1234567890",
  "address": "123 Main Street, City, State",
  "designation": "Software Developer",
  "hired_on": "2024-01-15"
}

request.description: Create a new employee. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Retrieve details of a specific employee.
Update employee information. Requires Admin, Manager, or Employee (own profile).
Delete an employee. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Get current user's employee profile. All authenticated users can access this endpoint.

item.description: Employee management endpoints. Admin and Manager users can manage employees, while employees can update their own profiles.

item.name: Projects

query.description: Order by: name, start_date, end_date, company__name, department__name

request.description: Retrieve a list of projects. All authenticated users can access this endpoint.

body.raw:
{
  "company": {{company_id}},
  "department": {{department_id}},
  "name": "Website Redesign Project",
  "description": "Complete redesign of company website with modern UI/UX",
  "start_date": "2024-02-01",
  "end_date": "2024-05-01",
  "assigned_employees": [{{employee_id}}]
}

request.description: Create a new project. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Retrieve details of a specific project.
Update project information. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Delete a project. Requires Admin or Manager role.

item.description: Project management endpoints. Admin and Manager users can create, update, and delete projects.

item.name: Performance Reviews

query.description: Search by employee name, feedback, notes

request.description: Retrieve a list of performance reviews. Access is filtered by user role.

body.raw:
{
  "employee": {{employee_id}},
  "reviewer": {{reviewer_id}},
  "stage": "pending_review",
  "review_date": "2024-03-15",
  "rating": 4,
  "feedback": "Excellent performance throughout the review period. Shows strong technical skills and good teamwork.",
  "notes": "Consider for promotion in next cycle."
}

request.description: Create a new performance review. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Retrieve details of a specific performance review.
Update performance review information. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Delete a performance review. Requires Admin or Manager role.
Transition performance review to next stage. Only valid transitions are allowed.

item.description: Performance review management endpoints with workflow state transitions. Admin and Manager users can manage reviews.

exec: // Set default values for variables if not already set

console.log('Could not parse response as JSON');

variable.description: Base URL for the API server
ID of a company for testing
ID of a department for testing
ID of an employee for testing
ID of a project for testing
ID of a performance review for testing
ID of a user for testing
